| image = Ms2capsid surface.png image_width = 200px image_alt = MS2 capsid

| familia = '[[Leviviridae]]' genus = Levivirus species = 'Bacteriophage MS2'}}

The 'bacteriophage MS2' is an icosahedral, positive-sense single-stranded RNA
virus that infects the bacterium [[Escherichia coli]]. van
Duin J, Tsareva N. Single-stranded RNA phages. Chapter 15 (pp. 175-196) in:
Calendar RL (ed.), The Bacteriophages (Second Edition). Oxford University Press,
2006.
